Vulnerability Title: Mozilla Firefox ESR Multiple Arbitrary Code Execution Vulnerabilities
Mozilla Firefox ESR Multiple Arbitrary Code Execution Vulnerabilities

Analyst Comments (shared):
1/8 CH - Vulnerability Alert issued; has been exploited in the wild. Due to risk of public interface exposure, due date for the vulnerability has been set to immediate patching.

1/9 CH - The concentrator has been successfully patched. Patching team also ran the external ict again after the patch and show zero issues. Closing SIR
